meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of myofibrils.
meanings.sent1: The myofibrillar structure of the muscle fibers helps in movement.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the myofibrillar composition of the muscle tissue.
meanings.sent3: The myofibrillar dance of the muscle cells was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like myofibrillar threads weaving through her body.
meanings.sent5: The myofibrillar nature of the muscle fibers made them strong and flexible.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the myofibrils of muscle cells.
meanings.sent1: The myofibrillar proteins play a crucial role in muscle contraction.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need to maintain their myofibrillar integrity for optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: The myofibrillar party in the muscle cells was a hit among the organelles.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as myofibrillar as the muscle fibers themselves.
meanings.sent5: The myofibrillar strength of the muscle cells was evident in their ability to lift heavy weights.
